title: Player support and ticket system
body: I have been trying to figure out the email that is linked to my league account. I forgot the email and have been trying to change it to my primary email. It will not work and it’s extremely frustrating because of the amount of money and time I’ve spent on my league account. I’ve submitted two tickets and I still haven’t got and response. Can someone please help.

replies.body: It looks like those two tickets were just submitted about an hour or so ago, so it'll take a bit longer before our agents get through the queue to answer them. If you're just trying to update the email on your account, they should be able to get that done after verifying yourself as the creator of the account.

Thank you so much. I Play on this acc everyday and when i found out that the email is one that i dont even remeber using i was very worried. I dont remember the password or email ID for the email linked to my League acc thats why i need it changed right away. thank you. 

also, how will they "answer" me? Will they email me?
You should get an email to notify you of the ticket response, which I believe should have the response as well as a link to the actual ticket!
